sections.heading: property; advertisement for and submission of bids not necessary
sections.text: In making purchases under sections 81-907 to 81-909, it shall not be necessary to first advertise for and require submission of bids.SourceLaws 1945, c. 234, ยง 2, p. 693.

81-908.Surplus property; advertisement for and submission of bids not necessary.

In making purchases under sections 81-907 to 81-909, it shall not be necessary to first advertise for and require submission of bids.

SourceLaws 1945, c. 234, ยง 2, p. 693.
